Description: Handle sherd of large Chian, possibly Wild Goat, Mature Animal Style or Grand Style, pottery chalice or heavy chalice; white slip; exterior glazed streaky black; interior reserved.
Curator's comments: Given the size of the handle, it likely belongs to a large chalice, such as those in the Wild Goat Style, or a heavy chalice. heavy chalices are typically found in the Mature Animal Style and Grand Styles.
Bibliographic references: Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GD.1333) (phase 2)
